title: Tall Stories
description: "Tall Stories" is the debut collection of fictional short stories by Jonny "Itch" Fox. Drawing from his colourful life experience of being a young punk, frontman of The King Blues, a double platinum selling rapper, community organiser and a political activist; Fox has created an imaginative fantasy world that includes a squat infested with zombie rats, a care home for old punks and a tour that needs to be completed with a dead bassist hidden in a guitar case. “A diminutive genius whose skills with a pen and pad at times border on the supernatural” Rock Sound With beautiful illustrations by long time collaborator Rebecca Lightbody, this follow up to the Amazon best selling “101 Haikus” tells these wonderfully original, often hilarious and sometimes bonkers folk stories and many, many more
author: Jonny ‘itch’ fox
